word:
(701)  Nov. 26, 1908.       B-332-'08. 
                                 Sanitarium, Calif., Nov. 25, 1908 

Elder J. A. Burden, Loma, Linda, Calif. 

Dear Brother Burden: 
     Willie has permitted me to read your recent letter to him, in which you speak of Elder Andross' need of help, and suggest that Elder Healey be called to Los Angeles to unite with him.
